title: firefox updated and now pages don't load
content: Firefox updated and now pages don't load at all or take forever and then don't work properly. I've never had an issue until the update. I want to go back to the older version that actually worked. How do I go back to the last version?
creator: stefratz

title: Turn off update nag on MacOS
content: What is the way to turn off the daily firefox update popup nag on MacOS? I've noticed Mozilla is heavy handed at shoving updates down your throat that break things but always come up short on communicating what changes were made. The last update broke printing and now it takes 2 minutes for timeout to occur every time I want to print a page. So I know there is a large community of users who want to turn off update nags, suppose every one of those users submitted a new complaint on a daily basis to nag Mozilla to turn the f*cking update nag off. What will it take?
creator: MarkHHunt

title: Firefox crashes on startup, even when trying to use Troubleshoot mode
content: After using Firefox for a minute, new tabs start crashing, and then the whole browser. This only started happening today.
creator: zai-tm
